          <title>
            <string language="en">The reversal of Earth's magnetic field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Umlenkung von Masse magnetisch 
fangen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'inversion du champ magnétique de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A reversão do campo magnético da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'inversione del campo magnetico della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αντιστροφή του γήινου μαγνητικού πεδίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La revocación del campo magnético de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the symmetrical changes in the direction of the Earth's magnetic field on either side of an oceanic ridge.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field reversal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic stripes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oceanic ridges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sea floor spreading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solidification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">symmetry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß die 
symmetrischen Änderungen in der Richtung der magnetischen Masse auf 
beiden Seiten von einer ozeanischen Kante auffangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les changements 
symétriques de la direction du champ magnétique de la terre de 
chaque côté d'une arête océanique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as mudanças simétricas
no sentido do campo magnético da terra em um ou outro lado de um cume
oceanic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i cambiamenti 
simmetrici nel senso del campo magnetico della terra da qualsiasi lato
di una cresta oceanica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει συμμετρικές αλλαγές στην 
κατεύθυνση του γήινου μαγνητικού πεδίου από κάθε πλευρά μιας 
ωκεάνειας κορυφογραμμής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los cambios simétricos
en la dirección del campo magnético de la tierra de cualquier lado 
de un canto oceánico.</string>
          </description>
